title: Quotes Videos & Pictures
description:
Send quotes about
Love, Motivation, Wishes & Greetings for every occasion
in WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger and every other platform. Surprise your friends & family during
Christmas time, Advent & New Year’s Eve
with wonderfully designed animated gift cards from our app!  Our mission is to help you
intensify your relationships
with your closest friends & family members and to bring
peace, joy and motivation
into their lives!
Positive quotes & sayings for all your feelings, with this app you will always find the right words. Share
beautifully animated
videos & pictures with
just one click
!
Save your favourites and touch the hearts and souls of your friends. Thousands of of quotes, sayings and citations - use them as motivational
wallpapers
and backgrounds or share them on social media.
What you can do:
💝
Show your love
to your partner and take your
relationship to the next level
😊 Intensify for
your friendships
by sending a beautiful, emotional message to your friends
💪 Send
motivational quotes
for success
😴 Wish
your special ones
a
Good Morning & a Good Night
🏖️ Looking forward to the
weekend? Friday is your day? Lazy Sunday?
Share your feelings by using our
tailor-made videos
!
☕
Love coffee?
Invite your colleagues to a
coffee break
!
🤳 Use our Videos as your
status
on social media and messengers
🦉 Find new thoughts and get more
wisdom for making decisions
🎁 Send
congratulations & greetings for birthday
, new year’s eve, marriage and much more
❤️
Find new friends
by sending them a short video that
makes their heart shine
description_html:
Send quotes about Love, Motivation, Wishes & Greetings for every occasion in WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger and every other platform. Surprise your friends & family during Christmas time, Advent & New Year’s Eve with wonderfully designed animated gift cards from our app!  Our mission is to help you intensify your relationships with your closest friends & family members and to bring peace, joy and motivation into their lives!

Positive quotes & sayings for all your feelings, with this app you will always find the right words. Share beautifully animated videos & pictures with just one click!
Save your favourites and touch the hearts and souls of your friends. Thousands of of quotes, sayings and citations - use them as motivational wallpapers and backgrounds or share them on social media. 

What you can do: 
💝 Show your love to your partner and take your relationship to the next level
😊 Intensify for your friendships by sending a beautiful, emotional message to your friends
💪 Send motivational quotes for success
😴 Wish your special ones a Good Morning & a Good Night
🏖️ Looking forward to the weekend? Friday is your day? Lazy Sunday? Share your feelings by using our tailor-made videos!
☕ Love coffee? Invite your colleagues to a coffee break!
🤳 Use our Videos as your status on social media and messengers
🦉 Find new thoughts and get more wisdom for making decisions
🎁 Send congratulations & greetings for birthday, new year’s eve, marriage and much more
❤️ Find new friends by sending them a short video that makes their heart shine
